page.title: 13Co-operative Farming-UNIVEG
page.content: Univeg is a production and marketing co-operative of twenty-one farmers. Univeg was formed 14 years ago and had 7 farmers instead of the 21 farmers now. Univeg now has an annual turnover of Â£6,500,000. Univeg employs 120 people and as many as 340 on the harvesting season. Univeg own about 15,500 acres. They own 12 acres of nursery. Univeg keep some vegetables in cold store. Their aim though is to harvest the crop and then get it to the shops as quickly as possible. Univeg also has an overnight trucking service. They aim to sell first class food all the time. Univeg works the way the customer needs it to work.
